website_summaries.verdict: The Lenovo 21e-20 is a solid budget ultraportable laptop, but its middling performance and battery life in our tests mean that it's best suited to those with very modest computing needs.
cons: Keyboard and touchpad are a little small
Below par performance and battery life compared with the competition

customer_reviews.title: Great computer for working on the morning train
customer_reviews.text: For some reason Microsoft told computer companies not to make anymore "net books" - small, lightweight computers that can be tucked away in a brief case. The only options I could find were a Mac or a Chromebook, neither one of which would meet my needs. Then I found this. It's perfect. At 2.5 lbs it's very light, and also very thin. It doesn't have a ton of speed, but I use it mainly for word processing, and a little light web browsing, and it's fine. The biggest drawback is the tiny SSD. I bought an inexpensive 60 GB SD card, and that helps out. The price is terrific, too.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad little unit for the price I got it at. Windows is an annoyance, and takes up almost all of the limited space that this unit ships with. Expect to be able to install just a few programs and browse the web. The keyboard takes some getting used to, and feels flimsy. The screen is decent, as is the touchpad. The casing is decent, but not super durable, and scratches easily. I hope to someday put Linux on this, and reclaim some disk space and processing power, but currently support is questionable. I'd put this in the category of a cheap chromebook/netbook, not really a laptop.
customer_reviews.author: JDL

customer_reviews.title: I took out the laptop and plugged it in and ...
customer_reviews.text: I took out the laptop and plugged it in and turned it on and it would not boot up properly. It gave the error that it hadn't closed down properly the last time it was turned on and gave the option to boot in safe mode, but before I could select anything it rebooted itself and went on to reboot over and over before I could shut it off and unplug/repack it to ship it back. I was offered a refund, but I'd bought this on sale and now the price has gone up.
customer_reviews.author: FL Gator Gal

customer_reviews.title: Bad  Touchpad Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: The first one worked fine until one day the touchpad stopped working completely. I am a computer technician and own my own computer business. I could not get the touchpad to work again: it wasn't even seen in Device Manager. I sent it back and got a replacement. The wireless is very flakey and now the mouse buttons on the touchpad have stopped working. Completely reset the PC twice and still can't get the buttons working. Check the Internet, this touchpad has all kinds of problems.
customer_reviews.author: CSRTech

customer_reviews.title: Great netbook, works great and fast.
customer_reviews.text: Neat little netbook, remember you will have to use a USB flash drive to install Windows 10 since there isn't enough space on the included hard drive. Once I out windows 10 on the machine made a world of difference compared to Windows 8. Especially since this does not have a touch screen. Works quite well fast too which surprised me for such a small price tag. Got it on sale for $139.
customer_reviews.author: JoeMin

customer_reviews.title: Good laptop for school
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of having to carry my heavier, bulkier laptop around with me all the time so I decided to buy this laptop, and it is a lot lighter. For all intents and purposes, it works great. It can even stream YouTube videos without any problems, but it does tend to get laggy with too many programs running, but that's to be expected given the price and specs. The bezels are huge, which makes the laptop seem like it's from 2010. The speakers are really good and put out quite some volume. Overall, this was a great purchase and my shoulders thank me for it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Huang

customer_reviews.title: Defective and a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. Bough this on August 3 2015 by January 6 2016 completely shuts down. Does not charge anymore. I am so upset right now. Can't even return this piece of garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela bissoondial

customer_reviews.title: I cannot get over how great it fits in my messenger bag without bulking it ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for mobile travel to school and home. I cannot get over how great it fits in my messenger bag without bulking it up. Of course, 32GB is not a lot (especially when the the OS takes up a third of it), but I don't give it a lower score because it still fits my needs as to why I bought it. I'd say the only real "cheap" part of it is the power button. It feels like I turn on a toy every time with the way it clicks, but it works so it's not that bad. Runs super smooth even if I only have 2.5 GB left on it (and I do!). Not disappointed at all.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Snowden

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop in October 2015 for $169.00. I was skeptical because of the price and thought I would have to buy a lot of add-ons to make it viable. Nope. I bought a 64 gb micro sd for more space - that's it. The machine has been awesome. It's compact and lightweight, but the keyboard doesn't feel cramped. It's fast with productivity tools and video on the web. It's much more than I expected. Would I pay the new price - $250ish? I don't think so; I would probably buy a different bargain Lenovo.
customer_reviews.author: Phisher

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Love this computer. Windows 8 was easy to learn. I like that I can carry it anywhere and even though I have a 13" Lenova that's fully load d and uses Windows 7, this laptop has become my new to go to laptop. I installed quite a number of programs despite the small GB size like Photoshop, Word etc., and the laptop runs really fast. Love the Bluetooth feature as mostly all my tech products are Bluetooth- the screen clarity is amazing. Super Happy with my purchase and one can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: SY214Top Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: Low power - fits basic needs - but later: BUGS!!
customer_reviews.text: Touchpad started having issues, (right-click stopped working) now HDMI-OUT port is having issues - no longer works right. Very low-frills Uber- basic laptop with very little storage. DOES have a Micro-SD card slot and can use the same micro SD cards as cell phones. great way to add storage (which is greatly needed!!)
customer_reviews.author: NCmacASL

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: No surprises here. This is a great value for the price. Looking for a portable laptop that has full features for a great price -- this is the one. I did upgrade to Windows 10 without issues (I had to use a 16GB USB pen drive for temp storage). Runs great and do live video streaming over twitch.tv with it. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Chrome Legion

customer_reviews.title: Dosen't last long.
customer_reviews.text: I always thought Lenovo makes good products based on the reviews I read online, but my experience was different. I purchased the S21e and it malfunctioned within a few months. The mouse stopped working apparently and since it was still in warranty, I sent it to the company for repair. For almost a month, they couldn't repair it because they didn't have the part that broke. Why did it have to take so long when you are the manufacturer. Its the worst experience ever and am never buying any lenovo product again, and their customer care sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Nsidibe

customer_reviews.title: A little notebook that packs a huge punch.
customer_reviews.text: It's great when I'm on the go. Light, durable, and small. It fits in my purse. The only issue i have is the small memory. It quickly fills up, but use an external drive and that's that. It has two USB ports ( one 3 one 2 ) and a memory card slot. For the price it's a good little notebook. I prefer this over the Chromebook.
customer_reviews.author: Kittie

customer_reviews.title: This computer is useless and a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This computer is useless and a waste of money. It does not have enough capacity to run Windows, and the memory is welded in, so no more can be added. It runs slow, and has too little memory to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect small laptop.
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect small laptop. It is smaller and lighter than my iPad and has all of the features of a full-service computer. I like it so well that I bought one for my son. He loves it, too. The price can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: REN

customer_reviews.title: Speedy Boot Up
customer_reviews.text: I thought this laptop would take a long time to boot up as it is on Windows 8 and with less than 4 gb ram. From initiate reboot and to logon screen, it took 20 sec. laptop is suitable for kids, presentation, web browsing. travel laptop. value for money
customer_reviews.author: Keith Neo

customer_reviews.title: A waste of my money
customer_reviews.text: The free upgrade to Windows 10 makes this device useless. Also, right out the box there is not enough free space to install Win10 without first deleting files. Smh!
customer_reviews.author: Rory

customer_reviews.title: This has a much more comfortable form factor and better screen than my $1000 ultralight
customer_reviews.text: Having owned many laptops from quad core gaming behemoth, Macbook Air to Chromebook this was a refreshing surprise. This has a much more comfortable form factor and better screen than my $1000 ultralight. You don't buy this for speed or a portable workstation. But as a travel or school notebook this is far more functional than a Chromebook especially if you are not always connected. You must first upgrade to windows 10 following the instruction posted by the other reviewers.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: A good value
customer_reviews.text: This is a handy little computer. It's portable, very versatile and quite functional. It's surprisingly fast and I'm able to a lot of things that I didn't think I'd be able to do with a small computer. A very good value.
customer_reviews.author: ViveElan

customer_reviews.title: great laptop for the price
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I had was it runs out of disk space to run a backup if you set up Windows 8.1 first and then upgrade to Windows 10. Connecting a USB Flash drive is too slow. Upgrade immediately when prompted. Otherwise, great laptop for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: SLEEK and STYLISH
customer_reviews.text: Monday, December 19, 2016 GREAT PURCHASE!!! I purchased this laptop 5 months ago and have not had ANY issues, whatsoever. You WILL be PLEASED, just like Me. Smile, Michele~
customer_reviews.author: Michele (NY)

customer_reviews.title: Nice; Expected more space.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice laptop. Really expected it to have more internal space. I can't even load Windows 10 on it. Put in a 32gb sd card; still not enough to load Windows 10.
customer_reviews.author: Jcaupe

customer_reviews.title: Great Bargain
customer_reviews.text: Hard to believe I could get a real Windows notebook for $139 on sale. It is inexpensive with very limited storage (only 32GB) but for what it cost, it was an amazing bargain. I thought I'd like return it but it is very good within its limits.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great for the money! Pretty snappy for surfing the web and watching movies. Hooks up nicely to the HDTV. The speakers on it are really nice and loud too!
customer_reviews.author: Buckingham

customer_reviews.title: Good travel laptop at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this laptop mainly for web surfing and email checking while traveling. After using it for a few days on Win 8.1, I upgraded to Win 10 and it runs just fine. The only minor con I have found is the keyboard. It is adequate but very thin so it flexes a bit when I'm typing on it.
customer_reviews.author: StrivingForMediocre

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far. Not a techie or gamer, so I can't advise regarding specs and techs, but if you're looking for a machine to log on to your work computer to do some work, check email, social media for under $200...solid little machine.
customer_reviews.author: RemyNYC

customer_reviews.title: The New Love of My Life
customer_reviews.text: I love, LOVE this laptop! Works perfectly for my needs. It has a relatively small solid state drive but for a person who works mostly in the cloud it is wonderful! Works quickly and quietly and is magnificently portable.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Crafton

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: For the price I paid is a very good product. It is small and compact great for anyone needing a basic laptop for a decent price. The only reason it gets four stars instead of five is the screen is not as clear as I would prefer depending on how you position it the picture will get "foggy" so it's not the best device to watch video on, also the mouse pad is very touchy.
customer_reviews.author: Alecia

customer_reviews.title: Will not load graphics. A bust!
customer_reviews.text: Slow! Can I return it and get my money back. It’s a piece of momento?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I just use it for light task like email, surfing net and write and edit word ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this laptop just to be able to work when I'm in travel. my main laptop is so heavy. this one so far meets all the expectations. I just use it for light task like email, surfing net and write and edit word files.
customer_reviews.author: rana

customer_reviews.title: ... a while and it's survived my husband who is terrible on electronics
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for a while and it's survived my husband who is terrible on electronics! We did need to but extra storage space for it though.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie L.

customer_reviews.title: Everything was great except the hard drive space is much too small
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great except the hard drive space is much too small. I need a small back up DJ music computer but this past all tests except hard drive.
customer_reviews.author: temeculatim

customer_reviews.title: works great for that purpose
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my kids to do homework on. works great for that purpose. Never had any issues. keyboard still working. Screen still working. built in wifi still working.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Lenovo
customer_reviews.text: Infact I was amaze when l received this product n l will recommend it to anyone it's really good the touch its slimness easy to handle and travel with. Is unique
customer_reviews.author: Nana Kwaku Antwi-Dako

customer_reviews.title: Travel Computer
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a power user, just bought this to take when traveling. For me it is perfect. Internet browsing and email is what I wanted and it is light and slim when I am carrying it. Just what I wanted at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Fred B.

customer_reviews.title: This is my new travel laptop
customer_reviews.text: Better than any Chromebook, at this price you can't miss. Updated to Win10 immediately, about 2 hours, no issues.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Not good at all
customer_reviews.text: Not good at all, I might have to return it in less than a month shuts off by itself and does not want to turn on also does not want to update to windows 10.
customer_reviews.author: Ada

customer_reviews.title: My daughter LOVES it! Light and fast, just ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES it! Light and fast, just what she needed to help her have a smooth colllege experience. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Charles/Jeannie Ross

customer_reviews.title: Great little laptop for the money!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size! Windows 10 upgrade was a little difficult, but manageable if you install it using a thumb drive. I have yet to figure out how to get the touchpad working after the upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: SkSchmidt

customer_reviews.title: Don't lose the power supply
customer_reviews.text: Replacement power supplies cost half as much as a new system.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore D. Sternberg

customer_reviews.title: Works great. ..
customer_reviews.text: Product works well. It is reasonably fast for what it is and the screen is surprisingly better than I thought it would be. I hook an external hard drive to it and upgraded it to Windows 10 which took a couple of hours. This unit has no fan so it is quiet... Overall happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: J. Gullett

customer_reviews.title: 64GB Flash would make this twice the laptop. And no need to run 64-bit OS either, as it has 2GB RAM.
customer_reviews.text: For the money, it probably deserves five stars. I just wish there had been a 64GB option.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great computer
customer_reviews.text: This computer has been the best gift to my in laws they have use it a lot they love it and it great computer.
customer_reviews.author: Chaunacey R Sloan

customer_reviews.title: The unit has no memory space, nearly all of ...
customer_reviews.text: The unit has no memory space, nearly all of the computer disk space is used by the operating system.
customer_reviews.author: Wild Bill

customer_reviews.title: very happy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great device. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not enough memory
customer_reviews.text: I got it to take on vacation for email and light duty.However, Internet Explorer takes up almost all of it's memory.And I cannot uninstall it. to use a different browser.
customer_reviews.author: Bogart

customer_reviews.title: ... regular laptop that you could put dvd's in towatch movies) I like it much better than the Acer ...
customer_reviews.text: While it's still not what I was looking for (I thought it was a regular laptop that you could put dvd's in to watch movies) I like it much better than the Acer Chrome. I do not like chrome at all. At least with the 1 I just purchased I can download Google apps that couldn't on chrome
customer_reviews.author: diane

customer_reviews.title: Small and light
customer_reviews.text: Small and light, this is my travel laptop. Adults only I think a kid would brake it
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: a very good laptop for the price
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a cheap laptop that I could travel with. The battery power is solid. The touch mouse has minor click issues but solved that issue by using my USB mouse. Overall, a very good laptop for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Marbles84

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It ok, not enough storage. Had to use external drive to upgrade to WINDOWS 10.
customer_reviews.author: Errick J Harmond

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, very portable.
customer_reviews.text: Not a powerhouse, but nice and light. Hard to beat for the price. I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Speed from SSD is excellent. Computing power for email/excel etc and even online ...
customer_reviews.text: Extraordinary for the money. Speed from SSD is excellent. Computing power for email/excel etc and even online video is more than sufficient. Size/weight is great. The screen is what you might expect given the price, but it is by no means disappointing. There is no compelling reason not to buy this.
customer_reviews.author: InfrequentReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: The computer works great. However, the hard drive is so small it could not upgrade to Windows 10 without an external hard drive even though I added a SD card for space.
customer_reviews.author: Clear Synopsis

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Good for basic computing. Surprising build quality. Fits very well in a backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Beckett

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Decent budget netbook. Managed to update to Win.10 with no problems after i got rid of all the bloatware.
customer_reviews.author: D. J. Pereira

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for simple tasks
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for simple tasks. Was travelling to Europe and carried this with me. Had no issues checking email, streaming video, listening to music..etc. Nice and portable. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: M. E. Capen

customer_reviews.title: this laptop is great as long as you dont want to play games ...
customer_reviews.text: this laptop is great as long as you dont want to play games other than pinball. it lags a bit here and there but nothing to really complain about.
customer_reviews.author: michael lockwood

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good laptop but very light, so much that it looks a little flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kaw

customer_reviews.title: That's about all she wants and it works fine.
customer_reviews.text: Picked it while on sale for my 10-year old daughter. Installed Windows 10 immediately (using an external USB drive) and put Chrome and Minecraft on it. That's about all she wants and it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: J Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Son enjoys using this!
customer_reviews.text: My son bought this and really likes it, easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Connie Stevens

customer_reviews.title: friends amazed.
customer_reviews.text: Xmas present to a young boy. He loves it, friends amazed.
customer_reviews.author: The Observer

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I am a college student and I am proud to say that this laptop has been helping me with all of my school stuffs. In fact, I can also watch video on Netflix and other sites. Love this laptop!
customer_reviews.author: Brent Eneri

customer_reviews.title: ... got this in the mail yesterday and I absolutely love it so far
customer_reviews.text: I just got this in the mail yesterday and I absolutely love it so far. The matte screen makes reading and otherwise using the device outside easier as it reduces screen glare. I love the size of the screen and the weight of the device. It is light, but the screen is big enough so that I do not have any issue reading text. The battery life is around 5 hours, which, while shorter than some devices, accommodates my needs of being able to use it for teaching as well as attending my own graduate seminars. I'm really happy with this purchase and would definitely recommend it to people looking for a lightweight device.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed in Lenovo-  Keep shopping you don't want this.
customer_reviews.text: If I could leave less than one star I would. I am very disappointed in Lenovo. I have used them as a go to for our business as they are durable and reliable. Then I bought two of these.... They are in the process of being returned as they were both so full of malware that the moment the connection to the internet was made the computers were no longer functional. Contact with the Tech support number offered through a Microsoft pop up indicated they could remove malware for 265.00 each.
customer_reviews.author: connections

customer_reviews.title: Cant run 2 Chrome windows.
customer_reviews.text: Useless. It cannot run 2 Chrome doc windows. It is a nice and light laptop but running the newest Windows 10 is not ideal.

customer_reviews.title: Legit
customer_reviews.text: Do not upgrade to windows 10 it'll take 20GB right off the bat. Either than that this can play games smoothly <3 such as minecraft lol

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality item. Screen does hurt your eyes if using for a while.

customer_reviews.text: So far...so good. Wish it had a bit more memory!

customer_reviews.text: if you need something to do basic computing internet , word excel while traveling this is excellent.

customer_reviews.text: doesn't have extension speaker output. got what i paid for.

customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. This is a workable laptop but no cd/dvd drive and lots of junk apps on it to start with. Don't go for the upgrade to the new windows it will wipe out your little memory.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a month ago and it doesn't work am so pissed

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for students u just have to add a as ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for students u just have to add a as card for more memory, and perfect for every day use as long as u don't do programming

customer_reviews.title: Memory Limit
customer_reviews.text: The computer is saying I'm close to my memory limit; so, I must have bought one that didn't fit my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Bell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent laptop! I would recommend not installing the free ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent laptop! I would recommend not installing the free windows 10 upgrade, it's completely unnecessary and takes up too much memory. This laptop is fast and runs youtubes, netflix etc flawlessly. Recieved it in 24 hours! Awesome seller & great Lenovo laptop.
customer_reviews.author: david warren

customer_reviews.title: Non-Standard Replacement Battery
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice little notebook computer. It's best feature is the frosted, non-glare screen. One poor feature is the lack of an Ethernet port. Its very worst feature is the use of a non-replaceable battery. Don't know what I will do when this thing will no longer hold a charge. Unbelievable....

customer_reviews.title: The screen is no good.
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes it's stuck on when boot up. The screen is no good.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not a good product. My husband didn't like it .....

customer_reviews.title: Rather disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this computer just wanting something small, lightweight, and portable This computer was all of those things until it completely permanently shut off. I unplugged the charger to go to a different room, when I plugged it back in the computer just died.

product_meta.title: Lenovo S21e 80M4002DUS 11.6-Inches Laptop (Intel Celeron N2840 2.1 GHz Processor, 2 GB DDR3 RAM, 32 GB SSD, Windows 8.1 Operating System)
product_meta.description:
The Lenovo S21e is thin, light and perfect for on-the-go consumers looking for an affordable laptop.

AMAZON.COM
